tasks.title: Create Life Event Object
tasks.description: Create the Life Event object (Life_Event__c) with fields: Event Name (Event_Name__c), Event Date (Event_Date__c), and Contact (Contact__c). Set sharing model to Private.
acceptance_criteria: Life Event object is created with specified fields.
Fields are set to required as specified.

tasks.title: Set Up Page Layout for Life Event
tasks.description: Create a user-friendly page layout for Life Event that includes Event Name, Event Date, and Contact Lookup fields arranged for easy input.
acceptance_criteria: Page layout includes Event Name, Event Date, and Contact fields.
Fields are arranged for optimal user input.

tasks.title: Create Email Notification Flow
tasks.description: Develop a Flow named 'Send_Life_Event_Email' that triggers an email notification to the associated Contact when a new Life Event record is created.
acceptance_criteria: Email notification is successfully sent to associated Contact upon record creation.

tasks.title: Configure Security Settings for Life Event
tasks.description: Set permissions for the Life Event object so that only the System Admin profile has access rights (Create, Read, Edit, Delete).
acceptance_criteria: System Admin profile has all necessary permissions.
Other profiles have no access to the Life Event object.

tasks.title: Testing and Validation of Life Event Setup
tasks.description: Conduct thorough testing of the Life Event setup by creating test records and verifying that the automation and security settings work as intended.
acceptance_criteria: Test records can be created successfully.
Email notifications are sent correctly upon record creation.
Security settings are enforced according to specifications.

key_risks: Potential errors in Flow configuration leading to no email notifications.
Misconfigured permissions preventing access to the Life Event object.
Inadequate testing could result in issues going live.
success_criteria: All tasks are completed and meet the acceptance criteria.
End-user feedback confirms usability and performance of the Life Event functionality.
Automation processes function without failure and security settings are effective.
